articles.title: About dataholic
articles.contents:
Data is breathing because it has life. And it is very sensitive and capricious. This is because it must be carefully trimmed and watered to produce the fruit of Insight. That’s why I’m standing there today.

Dataholic : The blog was named Dataholic. I am immersed in data and I want to spend a long time with data.

R packages
dlookr, “Tools for Data Diagnosis, Exploration, Transformation”
CRAN
Github

alookr, “Tools for Binary Classification Modeling”
CRAN
Github
